DOC.brief_title: A Study Laparoscopic Right Hemicolectomy Using Caudal-to-cranial Approach
DOC.detailed_description: To compare caudal-to-cranial approach medial-to-lateral approach laparoscopic right hemicolectomy advance right colon cancer . A prospective randomized control trial perform GI department , Guangdong provincial hospital Chinese Medicine October 2016 October 2024.The sample size，150 case advance right colon cancer , need calculated statistic .The 150 case randomly divide two group : laparoscopic radical right hemicolectomy use caudal-to-cranial ( CtC ) approach ( GroupCtC ) laparoscopic radical right hemicolectomy use medial-to-lateral ( MtL ) approach ( GroupMtL ) . Primary outcome operative time，The secondary outcome total blood loss , number lymph node dissect , average time ground activity , time first flatus , hospital stay , intra-operative complication post-operative complication，and others ' outcome Disease-free survival rate ( DFS ) 3 year 5 year , Overall survival rate（OS）at 3 year 5 years.The data two group compare .
